description.excerpt:
Java Binding for JSON-LD - Jackson (JB4JSON-LD-Jackson) is a binding of JB4JSON-LD for Jackson. 
The core implementation of JB4JSON-LD with a mapping example can be found at https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld.
JSON-LD serialization and deserialization for Java REST services. Jackson integration.

excerpt.body:
- Updated to core [0.8.8](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.8.8).
- Updated to Jackson 2.12.4 and jsonld-java 0.13.3.

- Updated to core 0.8.7 and implemented support for custom serializers on `JsonLdModule` level.
- Updated to Jackson 2.12.2

- build automation on Github
- update core to 0.8.6

- Update to core 0.8.4 and Jackson 2.12.1.

For functional improvements and bug fixes, see the core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.8.4).

- Updated to core 0.8.3, Jackson 2.12.0.

For functional improvements and bug fixes, see the core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.8.3).

- Updated to core 0.8.2, Jackson 2.11.3, JSON-LD Java 0.13.2.

For functional improvements and bug fixes, see the core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.8.2).
- Update core to 0.8.1.

Update dependencies - core 0.8.0, Jackson 2.11.2

For functional improvements and bug fixes, see the core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.8.0).

* Update dependencies - core 0.7.1

For functional improvements and bug fixes, see the core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.7.1).

* Updated dependencies - core 0.7.0

For functional improvements and bug fixes, see the core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.7.0).

* Update dependencies - core 0.6.0, Jackson 2.11.1.

For functional improvements and bug fixes, see the core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.6.0).

- Update dependencies.

See core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.5.1).

- Update dependencies.

See core [Release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.5.0).

- Added support for read-only and write-only access modes via `JsonProperty`.
- Added support for ignoring properties via `JsonIgnore`.
- Dependency upgrades: core 0.4.0, jsonld-java 0.12.5.

See core [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.4.0).
- Dependency updates: core 0.3.8, Jackson 2.9.9, jsonld-java 0.12.4.

Upgraded to core 0.3.7.

See its [Release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.3.7).
- Support for serialization of instances without `@OWLClass` annotation as long as they have non-empty `@Types` attribute.

Use core 0.3.5.

See its [Release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.3.5).

Use core 0.3.4.

See its [Release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.3.4).

Use core 0.3.3.

See its [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.3.3).

Use core 0.3.2.

See its [release notes](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jb4jsonld/releases/tag/v0.3.2).

Use core 0.3.1, which adds

- Support for polymorphic deserialization.
- Support for deserializing JSON-LD objects as plain identifier attribute values.
- Use core 0.2.1, which adds support for blank node identifiers.
- Using core 0.2.0.
- With core 0.1.1.

usage.excerpt:
JB4JSON-LD is based on annotations from [JOPA](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jopa), which enable POJO attributes
to be mapped to ontological constructs (i.e. to object, data or annotation properties) and Java classes to ontological
classes.

Use `@OWLDataProperty` to annotate data fields and `@OWLObjectProperty` to annotate fields referencing other mapped entities.

To integrate the library with Jackson, register a `cz.cvut.kbss.jsonld.jackson.JsonLdModule` in Jackson's `ObjectMapper` like this:

`objectMapper.registerModule(new JsonLdModule())`

and you should be good to go. See the `JsonLdSerializionTest` for examples.

See [https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jopa-examples/tree/master/jsonld](https://github.com/kbss-cvut/jopa-examples/tree/master/jsonld) for
an executable example of JB4JSON-LD-Jackson in action.

There are two ways to get JB4JSON-LD-Jackson:

* Clone repository/download zip and build it with Maven,
* Use a [Maven dependency](http://search.maven.org/#search%7Cga%7C1%7Ccz.cvut.kbss.jsonld):

```XML
<dependency>
    <groupId>cz.cvut.kbss.jsonld</groupId>
    <artifactId>jb4jsonld-jackson</artifactId>
</dependency>
```
